Hotels.HotelName: LA QUINTA INN STE NEW HAVEN
HotelDescription: Welcome to the La Quinta Inn and Suites New Haven hotel - we are here for you. Steeped with New England heritage ranging from charming lighthouses to world-class museums take advantage of everything the Elm City has to offer. Our La Quinta Inn and Suites provides comfortable convenient accommodations situated off I-95 Exit 46 and is the perfect location for travelers coming through New England whether on business or leisure. We offer shuttle service to Tweed New Haven Airport New Haven Train Station and local attractions within a 5-mile radius. Enjoy a delicious meal at our on-site Greek Olive Restaurant and Bar or order room service from their vast selection of comforting dishes and relax in your room. We are located just a stones throw away from Yale University Yale New Haven Hospitals Veterans Memorial Hospital and a short drive to Mohegan Sun Casino. Take an afternoon stroll through local shopping destinations including IKEA or head into Downtown and experience New Havens eclectic charm. Experience the nightlife with several dining and entertainment options just a short walking distance from the hotel. The Long-Wharf Theatre Shubert Theatre Brazis Italian Restaurant and Keys to the City dueling piano bar are among the many favorites. If business brings you to New Haven we are conveniently located in close proximity to local companies including Amtrak and Assa Abloy. The La Quinta Inn and Suites New Haven has 152 spacious guest rooms and suites each with a comfy pillowtop mattress. Wake up refreshed and enjoy your free deluxe continental breakfast that includes hot waffles coffee juice breads muffins and cereal. In the evenings have a drink at our on-site bar or take a relaxing swim in our exterior pool. Finish out your day with free high speed WIFI accessible in all rooms and public spaces or unwind in our on-site fitness center. All rooms include HD TV with free Showtime free parking coffee maker iron with ironing board hair dryer and free high-speed Wi-Fi. Hotels.HotelName: OMNI NEW HAVEN HOTEL AT YALE
HotelDescription: At this time there are service limitations in place at Omni New Haven Hotel at Yale. For a full list of limitations please see: https://www.omnihotels.com/hotels/new-haven-yale/property-details/updated-policies-servicesOur top priority has always been, and will continue to be, the safety and well-being of its associates and guests. Additional steps will be taken for associates to ensure all are adhering to local government requirements. We continue to update our already thorough cleaning guidelines and implemented additional processes and procedures to ensure the health, safety and comfort of our guests as part of the Omni Safe & Clean initiative. For more information, see Omni Safe & Clean at https://www.omnihotels.com/omni-safe-and-clean The Omni New Haven at Yale offers sophisticated yet refined style in an atmosphere of luxurious comfort complemented with polished service. Situated in the heart of New Haven the hotel is just steps from the historic campus of Yale University and New Haven Town Green. Beautifully appointed guest rooms feature plush bedding with fluffy duvets and offer views of either the historic sites on the Yale University campus or Long Island Sound. Internet access is available free of charge in public areas. Our rooftop restaurant, John Davenport's Restaurant offers cuisine with a New England flair enhanced with stunning views of the city. The hotel is within walking distance of a fine selection of theaters, shops, boutiques, and a variety of restaurants. A short drive away, guests can enjoy Connecticuts casinos, golfing, quaint sea side villages and outlet shopping. Union Station, offering rail service to Boston and New York City, is close by while Hartford Bradley International Airport is 50 miles away. Hotel is 100 percent smoke free. At this time there are service limitations in place at Omni New Haven Hotel at Yale. For a full list of limitations please see: https://www.omnihotels.com/hotels/new-haven-yale/property-details/updated-policies-services. At Omni Hotels and Resorts, the health and safety of our guests and associates has always been, and always will be, our top priority. COVID-19 has changed every facet of our world and the way we do business. In an effort to Stay A Part of Safety, we have updated our already thorough cleaning guidelines and implemented additional processes and procedures to ensure your health, safety and comfort as part of the new Omni Safe and Clean initiative. https://www.omnihotels.com/omni-safe-and-clean. The Omni New Haven is located in the heart of the city across from historic New Haven Green and just one block from the center of the Yale campus. Nearby are museums and the Shubert Theatre and College Street Music Hall, as well as numerous restaurants and galleries plus boutiques. Union Station offering Amtrak and Metro North Rail Service is 2 miles from the hotel while Hartford Bradley International Airport is 50 miles away. New Haven Tweed Airport is a 10 minute drive from the hotel. The property complies with American Disabilities Act guidelines. Total tax is 15 percent. Tax Breakdown-7.5 percent Sales tax and 7.5 percent Occupancy tax per room per night.
